triples.name: Artificial neural network
triples.relevance: Neural networks are the core sub-symbolic computation component integrated into NeurASP to provide probabilistic outputs for logical reasoning.

triples.name: Answer set programming
triples.relevance: ASP is the symbolic computation framework being extended by NeurASP to incorporate neural network outputs for knowledge representation and reasoning.

triples.name: Symbolic artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Symbolic reasoning provides the formal logical framework for encoding complex semantic constraints and rules to improve neural network perception results.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: NeurASP proposes a novel training approach where neural networks learn not only from implicit data correlations but also from explicit semantic constraints expressed as ASP rules.

triples.name: Neuro-symbolic AI
triples.relevance: NeurASP is a neuro-symbolic framework that integrates neural and symbolic AI by using neural network outputs as probability distributions over ASP facts.
